TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Fire Elemental. You must try again.
You have defeated the Fire Elemental.
Tauron Flamebite welcomes you into the Horned Temple. You receive the Firewalker award (+4 Fire Mastery).
You must travel to the nearby Volcano and enter its crater.
You must return to the Horned Temple and meet with Tauron.
